name: Escape Stoke
description:
Escape Stoke is a brutally hard platformer where a guy in a frog suit attempts to leave stoke-on-trent.

The game is inspired by Ness' moveset from Smash Bros with his movement mechanics but reworked into a 2D platformer

The game was made in just under 10 days using the unity engine by 2 people 

https://github.com/Hmilner1/LudJam .zip download link
